DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate short-term effectiveness combine occipital supraorbital transcutaneous nerve stimulation reduce migraine relate pain .
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Effectiveness Transcutaneous Nerve Stimulation Reducing Migraine Related Pain
DOC.criteria: Subjects confirm diagnosis migraine headache without aura typical migraine aura ( ICHDII code 1.2.1 1.1 ) . Subjects 16 migraine episode per month last 2 month . The subject capable understanding study sign inform consent . Subjects concomitant epilepsy . History neurosurgical intervention . Subjects metal implant shrapnel head , except dental implant . Subjects implanted cardiac pacemaker , neurostimulators , surgical clip ( shoulder line ) medical pump . History drug abuse alcoholism . History medication overuse headache . Participation current clinical study participate clinical study within 3 month prior study . Skin lesion inflammation region stimulate electrode . Personality somatoform disorder . Pregnancy Lactation . Women reproductive age use efficient contraceptive method . History cerebrovascular event .
